thread.title: WATCH: Elderly Man Pepper-Sprayed By Anti-Trump Protester
thread.title_full: WATCH: Elderly Man Pepper-Sprayed By Anti-Trump Protester

author: Wilmot Proviso
title: WATCH: Elderly Man Pepper-Sprayed By Anti-Trump Protester
text:
OOPS: Democrats Shamed for Silencing Woman Who Fled Communism 
The Salt Lake Tribune reported that the ‚ÄúMarch 4 Trump‚Äù began at the Martin Luther King Jr. Civic Center Park in Berkeley. The location was just 10 blocks away from the campus of the University of California at Berkeley, which naturally attracted a lot of counterprotesters ‚Äî some of whom turned violent. 
The man who was pepper-sprayed was identified as Jim Templeton, a septuagenarian who had exchanged some heated words with the counterprotesters. However, no evidence existed that he was violent, only that he had confronted anti-Trump protesters. 
In this video, he‚Äôs confronting a man who says he will ‚Äúp*** on that s***‚Äù (that s*** being the American flag, according to the tweet). Advertisement - story continues below 
Templeton challenged him on that and then was pepper-sprayed by an individual who ran away. Elderly Trump supporter pepper sprayed by Antifa girl at a Berkeley rally. Girl runs away like a coward. #Berkeley #Antifa üò° pic.twitter.com/TWjPjiArWR 
‚Äî ZeroPointNow (@ZeroPointNow) March 5, 2017 
The tweet alleged the individual was with the Antifa contingent, although that hadn‚Äôt been confirmed by mainstream media. However, it would fit with past behavior by these protesters ‚Äî and we would really expect the mainstream media to break their backs trying to identify an anti-Trump protester anyway. 
The Salt Lake Tribune reported at least 10 arrests, as well as seven injuries. It‚Äôs unknown whether this pepper sprayer was among them. Advertisement - story continues below
